title: TV Prepares for a Chaotic Midterm Night
description: Broadcasters face challenges as they approach the climax of an election season marked by disinformation and distrust.
dc:creator: Michael M. Grynbaum
media:description: CBS has been televising elections since 1948. But this is the first year that the network has felt the need for a “Democracy Desk” as a cornerstone of its live coverage.
